Claim: "The girls are having a great time looking for seashells."
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsHaving(a) and IsLooking(a) and IsSeashells(b))) & (forall c ( IsHaving(c) ->  IsHappy(c))) & (forall d ( IsHappy(d) ->  IsHaving(d))) & (forall e ( IsHappy(e) ->   IsLooking(e)))) -> (exists a (IsHappy(a)))
